alert.note: Alert for Ben Hill; Berrien; Brooks; Colquitt; Cook; Grady; Irwin; Lanier; Lowndes; Thomas; Tift; Turner (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Watch issued March 31 at 10:43AM EDT until March 31 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: TORNADO WATCH 85 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 2 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN FLORIDA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 7 COUNTIES IN BIG BEND FLORIDA FRANKLIN JEFFERSON LAFAYETTE LEON MADISON TAYLOR WAKULLA IN GEORGIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 12 COUNTIES IN SOUTH CENTRAL GEORGIA BEN HILL BERRIEN BROOKS COLQUITT COOK IRWIN LANIER LOWNDES THOMAS TIFT TURNER IN SOUTHWEST GEORGIA GRADY THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ABBA, ADAMS BEACH, ADEL, ALMA, APALACHICOLA, ASHBURN, ASHTON, ATHENA, BANNOCKBURN, BARNEYVILLE, BAY CITY, BEACHTON, BERRIEN CO A/P, BETHEL, BEVERLY, BLUE SPRINGS, BLUE SPRINGS, BOWENS MILL, BOYD, BRADFORDVILLE, BROOKS CO A/P, BUCELL JUNCTION, BUCK SIDING, BUCKVILLE, CABBAGE GROVE, CAIRO, CAPEL, CAPITOLA, CAPPS, CARBUR, CARRABELLE, CASA BLANCO, CHAIRES, CHAIRES CROSSROADS, CHERRY LAKE, CHULA, COOK CO A/P, COOKS HAMMOCK, COTTLE, COURTHOUSE, DAY, DILLON, DILLS, DIXIE, DRIFTON, ELPINO, EMPRESS, FESTUS, FITZGERALD, FITZGERALD MUNICIPAL A/P, FORT GADSDEN, GRADY CO A/P, GREGGS, GROOVERVILLE, HANSON, HARDING, HILLIARDVILLE, HOBBY, HOPEWELL, IRWINVILLE, JARROTT, KILLEARN ESTATES, KILLEARN LAKES, LACONTE, LAKELAND, LOVETT, MACLAY STATE GARDENS, MADISON, MASSEE, MAYO, METCALF, MIDWAY, MONCRIEF, MONTICELLO, MOULTRIE, MOULTRIE MUNICIPAL A/P, NANKIN, NASHVILLE, OCILLA, PASCO, PERRY, PINE PARK, PINE VALLEY, PINETTA, QUEENSLAND, QUITMAN, SOPCHOPPY, SPENCE AIRPORT, ST. MARKS, SUNSWEET, TALLAHASSEE, TEETERVILLE, THOMASVILLE, TIFTON, TILTON, VALDOSTA, VALDOSTA REGIONAL AIRPORT, WAKULLA SPRINGS, WATERLOO, WEBER, WESTWOOD, AND WORTH.
